title: Diljit Dosanjh AURA Tour
articleDescription: Public transport for Diljit Dosanjh AURA Tour: Saturday 1 November 2025
articleContent:
We'll run extra public transport services to help you get to Diljit Dosanjh AURA 2025 tour at AAMI Park on Saturday 1 November.

  • Gates open at 6:00pm
  • Event begins at 7:00pm

Before you travel

Plan your journey using Journey Planner and check Disruptions for service changes that may affect your journey. 

If you use Journey Planner within 14 days of this event, you'll see all the extra services we've added to help you get there.
